file_content.text: You come when I am most troubled, as predicted.
What seems to be the matter?
The message you sent did help.
A path unfolded is easily traversed.
If you're trying to impress me, you're falling very short.
I see and speak. That is my purpose. No other reason is needed.
My eyes seek those who would aid you. To interpret my own visions... it seeds doubt.
I can try to interpret for you.
So you've seen something, but don't know what to make of it?
It is so.
We make do with what we have. You'll have to figure it out.
Perhaps we both can find the truth.
I have seen a man. He glistens in the light, but finds himself in darkness.
His eyes are wide. Set in two directions. He walks between them, mired, unable to move on.
I've heard the legend of the Shining Man. I've even walked his path. Could it be related?
The Shining Man is part of the past. The man who glistens is of the future.
If you're sure it's a Force-sensitive, then it sounds like someone having a crisis of conscience.
There is conflict within. Its nature is not known.
Sounds a lot like Revan, but I don't think he'll be helping us. Not directly anyway.
I share your mind and intuition on this.
Ooo! Blizz want to try!
I can't work with that. Come back when you've got something I can actually follow up on.
Aww, Big Boss done with game already? Blizz like trying to understand colorful-lady!
Blizz meet shiny Jedi man on big job. Maybe colorful-lady see him?
Tell me about this shiny Jedi.
I don't know, what are the odds of that?
The workings of the universe are seldom random.
Don't interrupt.
Aww....
Let him speak, Commander. The little one sees purely, where we project meaning.
Umm, Blizz know shiny Jedi man pay good. He hire Blizz crew to find him secret box. Blizz make him pay extra not to look inside.
Blizz can send message to shiny Jedi if Big Boss want. Maybe he meet Big Boss and join crew!
It can't hurt to try speaking to this Jedi.
Blizz great at finding things and people! Big Boss count on Blizz!
Good work, Blizz. You're a great help.
Yay! Blizz helping!
Shown up by a Jawa. Some mystic.
What happens is what was meant to.
Blizz go talk to shiny Jedi man right now! Big Boss come see Blizz soon!
